p: Interestingly, commensal bacteria have been reported as essential for immune homeostasis and functions. In fact, respiratory tract dendritic cells were not able to migrate to the draining lymph node and prime T-cell responses in antibiotic-treated mice after influenza infection [ 4]. Indeed, the microbiota provides stimulatory and maturation signals to immune system, leading to protection against potential pathogens and microbiota disorders [ 5].
